```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
questions <- c(
  "500 diamonds",
  "Price of a diamond",
  "A diamond"
)
solutions <- c(FALSE, FALSE, TRUE)
explanations <- character(3)
```

Question
========
The following data frame contains prices and other attributes of 500 diamonds._
\
```{r dataframe, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 4, fig.width = 5, fig.path = "", fig.cap = ""}
diamonds %>% head(500)
```

What does each row in this data frame represent?

```{r questionlist, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(questions, markup = "markdown")
```


Solution
========

```{r solutionlist, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(ifelse(solutions, "True", "False"), explanations, markup = "markdown")
```
